doc.post: This whole "story" is a bit odd and inconsequential. She wants to own a gun to keep at home and protect her and her family. This is allowed. What's this got to do with President Obama's new proposals?

You don't start with an outright ban, you slowly chip away at the right to own guns. The proposals are the beginning of a long road ahead.
